lyrics:
Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi itan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
Min phuar tang lai ah.

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi I tan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
Min phuar tang lai ah.

Hey yo baby what's the wait
Can you tell me we want to do
Cause I'm trying be your man
I want you to be my boo
I've been thinking about you all day long
I hope you do it too
Don't know how to make a move
Cause you came right off the blue
Guy your so fine (Guy your so fine)
Just can't be mine (Just can't be mine)
Can hear my light (Can hear my light)
From anytime (From anytime)
You can call me anytime
And I'm gonna be right there for you
Or them haters they be hating baby
We're just we're too cool too

But my girl 10 out of 10
But for now I'm not her man
I'm gonna show you that I can't
Thank the lord I say Amen

But my girl 10 out of 10
But for now I'm not her man
I'm gonna show you that I can't
Thank the lord I say Amen

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi itan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
min phuar tang lai ah.

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi I tan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
Min phuar tang lai ah.

Ka ka ka hmangaih che
Thlanfim tlapur khawp in ka hlim
Ka phur ka theitawp in ka en
Kawl ang che thlaveng
Stan kan pa pathian hi nise
Kan Chenna run leh kan veng
Te hlei hlei hian an nghakhlel

Lawm chak vek kanni
E mo thar mo thar
Enteh ruat sa sak vek ani e
Lawichal lawichal
Ka tan hian I tling zo inring roh
I tan pawh ka tling tawk min ring rawh
Okay eng pawh chu nise
Ka tawng che ka lawm e
Lo lawi mai teh

Ngaihngam tak in Nausen iang in
Ka tang ah hian
Lo bei hle hle
Lo bei hle hle
Duh tin Sam in tiang hian
Suangtuahna nen zanlai hawl ah
Zan mu ka thlawk van lai zawk ah
Ka lu ahai ani itawn ah

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi itan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
min phuar tang lai ah.

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi I tan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
Min phuar tang lai ah.

Darthlang aw darthlang
Khawvel ah tunge hmel tha ber
Imm nia a dik adik
Ka chhai lai di a hmel tha ber
Kawng sir a kallai
Ka hmuh Chang te phei chuan in
Mittla lek" deuh thaw in
Ka mitsir kumtluang thin

Mit tla van vuai in thinlai ruk I luah hneh
Van chung nula zawng zawng te pawh ikhum vek
Khuanu reng hian
Mibik tur in aduan che
Hahip in kan sawi cham chi
Ka suihlung hi idum ber

Aw I ril rem leh I check mil zawng
Nih ngei ka duh
Ka tang ah I bei ve theih Nan
HMA hrang hrang la in
Theihtawp ka chhuah
ka tan chauh lo vul ve hram la.

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi itan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
min phuar tang lai ah.

Ka phuloh phalloh di
He ka thin lung hi
Hmangaih lo theilo che isiam si
Ka hun pum hi I tan chauh ka hmang ral ang
I zun leng zam vel ten
min phuar tang lai ah...

meaning:
I would appreciate if someone can provide me the meaning of this song.
I am not Chin, so I unfortunately do not understand the song.
You can provide the meaning by pasting it in Report/Suggest button above.
 Thank you so much and sorry for your inconvienience.
